instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
USing 85W charger, getting only 12.3V on PPBUS_G3H. NO light on charger adapter. Replaced DCIN adapter with many different. SYS_ONewire is low usually at .7V sometimes at 1.3V (diode check red to ground there is .6V). I checked trace from U6900 to SMC and .9 ohms resistance. I've swapped the SMC 3 times and reballed etc... Replaced U6900.

Board does not start with battery and trigger SMC_ONOFF either.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: As always you have to check PP3V42_G3H, PP3V3_S5_SMC_VDDA and SMC_RESET_L.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
PP3V42_G3H is 3.49V
PP3V3_S5_SMC_VDDA is 3.49V
SMC_RESET_L is 3.45V

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
Incorrect PPBUS_G3H, there is a communication problem between SMC and U7000.
Did you test disconnecting BIL?
Post voltage and diode mode to ground ay SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: Scl/sda lines are 3 mV difference. Board is out of the Mac so no BIL connected. I’ll swap the U7000 and check continuity between it and SMC where relevant.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
Swap why???

"diode mode to ground ay SCL/SDA lines"
You've said something about 3mV.
I supposed to be voltage.
Many tinmes I said do not post "V" for diode mode readings...

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: When I checked them they were .003 apart.  .504 vs .507 diode red to ground

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
Diode mode values look good, but voltage?
If equal, then could be bad SMC, or U7000 (less probable).
Be sure R7000 is OK.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: R7000 is good. Voltage at SDA/SCL charger only is 3.49V. I tried swapping U7000 just in case being I already tried the SMC at least 3 times with no change in results.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: Any chance this could be firmware related?

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
Did you change SMC 3 times???
Be sure to use one from donor 3115 board.
Still no Magsafe light?

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: Yes, used from 3115 donors. No MagSafe light and no boost of PPBUS_G3H.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: Would be very unusual but you should check components in Y5010 circuit and continuity across traces. Also confirm no short to ground on PP1V2_S5_SMC_VDDC.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
Check voltages and signals for U4900 (2 OF 2) at page 45.

Do you get SMC_PM_G2_EN?
Possibly not, but you didn't correctly reply to a previous question.
You've been asked about 3V3_S5.
3V3_S5_SMC comes from 3V42_G3H, not from L7220.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
I do not get SMC_PM_G2_EN. It is 0V. SO you're right I don't get 3v3_S5. I actually thought I had checked that before but Piernov asked for 3v3_S5_SMC specifically.

Doesn't appear to be a short there. I traded out the U7941 just in case. So if not the SMC then must be the trace from SMC to U7941?

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message:
"Check voltages and signals for U4900 (2 OF 2) at page 45."
???

Any oscillation at SMC_E/XTAL?
Post DC level at least.

threads.title: 3115 not boosting PPBUS_G3H to 12.6V SMC Swapathon
threads.message: DAH it was related to the a missing trace from Y5010 to R5010 AND a bad DCIN board. Now I'm getting 12.65V on PPBUS_G3H and fan spin. Thanks Guys!
